features: ✅【Sturdy Metal Tripod Mount】 New Upgraded phone tripod adapter adopts an all-metal design, which is sturdy and durable. After anodizing and sandblasting treatment, the surface texture is advanced and comfortable to touch, which is more textured than ordinary plastic phone clips. During your use, you don't need to worry about it being damaged.

✅【With 3 Cold Shoes and 1/4" Screw】This phone tripod comes with a standard 1/4" screw port and 3 cold shoe, which you can use to expand the microphone, LED lights, camera, for Vlog or Shooting, and even live streaming on YouTube.

✅ 【With a hot shoe locking knob】It comes with a hot shoe locking knob at the bottom that is compatible with most cameras and universal joints, such as Sony, Canon, and Nikon cameras, DJI Ronin S/SC/RS, and Zhiyun Crane gimbal, among others. This makes installation on the tripod faster and more convenient.

✅【Supports Pitch angle shooting】 It is equipped with 360°rotation and 180°vertical flipping modes, allowing you to freely adjust on the Z-axis without moving the tripod, meeting your shooting needs and allowing your photography to have (vertical) multi angle options.

✅【Extra Wide Compatibility】VICHSAMWY phone holder for tripod compatible with iPhone 14/14Pro/14 Max/14Pro Max/13/13Pro/13Pro Max/12/12Pro/12Pro Max/11/11Pro/11Pro Max/X/Xs/XR/Xs Max,8/7/6/6s, iPhone 6/6s plus, iPhone SE,Samsung Galaxy S23/S22 Ultra s10 s10plus S9 S9+ S8/S8+/S7/S6/S6 edge, Note 10 9 8 5 4 3 and many other phone.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Most Sturdy Tripod Mount VICHSAMWY Full-metal phone tripod mount is made of aircraft grade aluminum alloy material. After precision machining, the surface is anodized and sandblasted, it is strong, wear-resistant, corrosion-resistant, and has a long service life.It is the perfect accessory for your photography and videography needs. This sturdy mount is designed with a full metal construction, ensuring durability and stability during use. With its easy-to-use switching plate, you can effortlessly switch between your phone and camera, allowing you to capture stunning shots from different devices. The mount securely holds your phone in place, providing a reliable platform for shooting videos, taking selfies, or capturing memorable moments. Its compact and lightweight design makes it portable and travel-friendly, allowing you to capture amazing shots wherever you go. Whether you're a professional photographer, content creator, or simply someone who loves capturing moments, our Full Metal Phone Tripod Mount is a must-have accessory. Enhance your photography skills and take your creativity to new heights with this versatile and reliable mount.
360° rotatable, allowing you to freely adjust on the Z-axis without moving the tripod,easy to switch horizontal or vertical angle to suit different photography needs.

2 side cold shoes and a back cold shoe can add a microphone and a fill light or other film device at same time. The bottom 1/4" and arca ports are suitable for a variety of professional tripod devices.such as Sony, Canon, and Nikon cameras, DJI Ronin S/SC/RS, and Zhiyun Crane gimbal, among others. This makes installation on the tripod faster and more convenient.
It is equipped with 180°vertical flipping, meeting your shooting needs and allowing your photography to have (vertical) multi angle options.

High Quality Metal Material VICHSAMWY Full-Metal phone tripod mount is made of high-quality aircraft grade aluminum, the surface is anodized and sandblasted, which is strong, wear-resistant and corrosion-resistant, and has a long service life. Standard 1/4" Arca Mount A Standard 1/4" screw port is added at the bottom for connecting a tripod. It is Compatible with most tripods on the market. Multiple Extension This 360°rotation smartphone holder with 2 side cold shoes, 1 cold shoe on the back and 1/4" expansion hole design, you can attach additionally LED lights, microphones or other film device. It can help you shoot stable Videos for Facebook, Youtube, TikTok and platforms as well as live streaming channels.

Phone Stand with 360°Rotating Base Phone Stand with 360°Rotating Base Phone Stand with 360°Rotating Base Taller Phone Stand phone tripod mount with quick release plate Full Metal ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Adjustable with 360°Rotating ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Adjustable with Height ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent sturdy cell phone adapter for tripod!
reviews.reviewText: This was the only adapter I found that fits a thick bandolier iPhone cover to fit on a tripod. It’s a pain to take my iPhone cover off my iPhone before placing it on a tripod for videos and group picture taking. I was so ecstatic to find this adapter that actually fits a thick iPhone cover. It’s also sturdy and well made. I am purchasing a second one for a friend who was admiring mine as a gift. Thanks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great construction, a little heavy
reviews.reviewText: I used this on my s23 ultra (in a case) and there are no problems holding the phone. I am not sure how much it weighs, but you can tell its there on a selfie stick.---Revised---I am adding this to several items I have ordered because they work so well together and this might help you do something similar.While planning for a trip to the Denali National Park, I decided for a number of reasons, that I wanted to shot video and photos from the same monopod using two different devices at the same time. My normal monopod was too heavy to lug around with two things on it while fully extended, so I opted for a higher end selfie stick.I like to have 20 to 40 feet of cord when hiking in the event of an emergency, so I wrapped the handle of the selfie stick. This added some color and improved the grip.Next I ordered a reliable phone mount for the top of the selfie stick. That covered the cell phone on the selfie.Below that, I wanted a boom/cycle mount for an action camera. For this I ordered some action camera mounts, a cycle camera mount/aluminum boom.After assembly, it came out really nice and has been working very well. In case you want to build a similar setup, here are the parts:- https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0C3BWV836- https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0C18SP4T2- https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0BYHNQWSPI have had several strangers comment on the setup and ask me a bunch of questions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good mount but I went with something else
reviews.reviewText: High quality materials and does the job great. I like how the holder does not obstruct a cable that may be plugged in at the bottom of the phone. The cold shoe in the front is uncommon and a good spot for my wireless mic receiver. However, I tried to like the spring tension, but it’s just not for me. I went with another holder.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars VICHSAMWY Full Metal Phone Tripod Mount
reviews.reviewText: VICHSAMWY Full Metal Phone Tripod Mount Great. Works with my tripod and wit my light stands. Sometimes we don't won't to pull out the big DSLR and its better just to use our smartphones. You can use the timer on the phone camera or buy bluetooth camera phone remotes from Amazon to take the picture on your phone (cost undrer $10)..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great phone mount
reviews.reviewText: Great quality phone mount! Very sturdy all aluminum body. Seems like it will last a very long time.I can solve the mystery about the red "locking konb" for the landscape/portrait pivot point. The red you see is a cap that is super glued into place. I ripped mine off with pliers, but you could potentially get some acetone or other solvent in there and get it off without marring it. Underneath is a bolt that takes a 5mm allen wrench. It is an M6x16mm. There are two steel and two keyed plastic washers. The bolt is secured into the body of the mount with blue thread locker. So this is, in fact, adjustable. You will probably need to clean off, then add more thread locker if you want to adjust the pivot resistance. I just wanted to remove the arm.I used an existing dashboard bolt, and fabricated an aluminum bracket to bolt the phone mount to. The result is the most solid car phone mount I have ever seen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars best one I've tried
reviews.reviewText: best phone mount I've tried so far. just wish it had a locking feature for the rotation. other than that its really solid and holds the phone great so I can whip it around without being afraid to lose my phone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Started out strong……but
reviews.reviewText: Started strong but faded quickly. The clamping motion got sticky to the point of it barely allowing the phone to enter. Rotating the phone to vertical was a pain as well, had to readjust the phone position.

reviews.reviewTitle: Arca Swiss mount is a good idea but design tolerances are off
reviews.reviewText: The concept of this product is great. A key feature is the arca mounting. When I mounted this is my other standard arca Swiss plate there was a lot of wiggle. I had to mount this device on to another arca Swiss mount to use it. Other than that it is good.
